name: SRPG Chess
description:
This is a simple game of chess using the SRPG Studio engine made by SapphireSoft.

The game has one single-player mode, where the player always controls the white pieces.

Credits

Most of the game is made by me (Goinza), but the music is made by Alquimia (https://soundcloud.com/user-449899893) and the tileset used for the chess board was taken from an asset pack sold by PVGames (https://pvgames.itch.io/pvgames-sci-fi)
